tool.name: Alphafold
tool.description: : This class is a wrapper for downloading a PDB structure from the AlphaFold Protein Structure Database.
tool.command:
#if $config.sele == "option1": ln -s -f ${config.properties} ${config.properties}_`echo $$`.${config.properties.ext}; #end if
alphafold
#if $config.sele == "option1": --config ${config.properties}_`echo $$`.${config.properties.ext} #else if $config.sele == "option2": --config '${config.jsonstr}' #else if $config.sele == "option3": --config '__oc____dq__uniprot_code__dq__:__dq__${properties.uniprot_code}__dq____cc__' #end if
--output_pdb_path $outname_output_pdb_path ; #if $config.sele == "option1": rm -f ${config.properties}_`echo $$`.${config.properties.ext}; #end if
if test -f $outname_output_pdb_path; then mv $outname_output_pdb_path $output_pdb_path; fi;

param.name: outname_output_pdb_path
param.label: output PDB name
param.help: Path to the output PDB file Format: [output].pdb

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax
